Package org.svvrl.goal.cmd

Class BlockStmt

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.cmd.BlockStmt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Statement
public class BlockStmt
extends java.lang.Object
implements Statement
A block statement contains a sequence of statements.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BlockStmt()
    Constructs an empty block statement.
    BlockStmt​(java.util.List<Statement> stmts)
    Constructs this block statement with sub-statements.
    BlockStmt​(Statement[] stmts)
    Constructs this block statement with sub-statements.

    • eval

      public void eval​(Context ctx) throws EvaluationException, BreakException, ContinueException
      Description copied from interface: Statement
      Evaluates this statement under a specified context.
      Specified by:
      eval in interface Statement
      Parameters:
      ctx - the context for this evaluation
      Throws:
      EvaluationException - if there is an error during the evaluation
      BreakException - if a break statement is evaluated during this evaluation
      ContinueException - if a continue statement is evaluated during this evaluation
